info.title: Docurain
info.description: DocurainAPI Communication Connector. Docurain API allows you to create your own documents using template files registered in Docurain and data from PowerAppsn.

schema.title: body
schema.description: Reply to the binary data of the rendered form.

schema.title: body
schema.description: Reply to the JSON containing the error details.

post.description: This API renders a form by specifying the name of a template saved in Docurain beforehand.

parameters.name: outType
parameters.description: Set the output format: pdf, xls(xlsx), png, jpg, jpg, gif, svg

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: Specify the name of the template you have already saved in Docurain.

parameters.name: X-Docurain-Data-Type
parameters.description: Set the data format : json, csv, tsv

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specify the string data in the format (json/csv/tsv) that you specify for the data format.

schema.description: Specify the format of the data in the data format.
schema.title: data

resultId.description: ID for querying the processing status of the asynchronous API and obtaining processing results
resultId.title: resultId

post.description: API to render a form asynchronously by specifying the name of a template saved in Docurain beforehand.

parameters.name: outType
parameters.description: Set the output format: pdf, xls(xlsx), png, jpg, jpg, gif, svg

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: Specify the name of the template you have already saved in Docurain.

parameters.name: X-Docurain-Data-Type
parameters.description: Set the data format : json, csv, tsv

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specify the string data in the format (json/csv/tsv) that you specify for the data format.

schema.description: Specify the format of the data in the data format.
schema.title: data

status.description: Processing status of the specified result ID: PROCESSING:Rendering in progress, FAIL:Failure, SUCCESS:Success
status.title: status

get.description: Get the processing status of the specified result ID.

parameters.name: resultId
parameters.description: Specify the result ID returned by RenderAsync.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Result ID to query processing status

schema.title: body
schema.description: If the process is successful, the binary data of the generated form is returned. If the process fails, JSON with the details of the error is returned.

get.description: Get the processing result of the specified result ID.

parameters.name: resultId
parameters.description: Specify the result ID returned by RenderAsync.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Result ID of the processing result to be acquired.
